definition: to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Cupid shot the leaden -pointed arrow straight at Daphne's heart.
sentences.chinese: 邱比特举起那支铅头的箭，对准戴芙妮的心射过去。

sentences.english: It can lift 10 times its bodyweight: two tons.
sentences.chinese: 它能举起10倍于自身体重的物体。

sentences.english: Dr. Halsey held up a hand , indicating that he halt.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔茜博士举起一只手，示意他停一下。
他再次举起自己的望远镜。

sentences.english: "Look, Nanny, perfume, " Eleanor holds up a bottle of cologne.
sentences.chinese: “太婆，看，香水，”埃莉诺举起了一瓶香水。

sentences.english: Oh, the wind beneath my wings.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你就是那风，托举起我的双翼。

sentences.english: He is so strong that he can lift the stone .
sentences.chinese: 他如此的强壮，以致于可以举起这块石头。

sentences.english: He involuntarily raised his hand to scratch his head.
sentences.chinese: 他下意识地举起手来搔他的头顶。

sentences.english: Paused lifts the hand in the past's light youth to cancel the recollection.
sentences.chinese: 暂停中取消回忆过去的光青年举起手。

sentences.english: She ups with her brawny arm.
sentences.chinese: 她举起了自己强壮的手臂。

sentences.english: A student in the back raised his hand.
sentences.chinese: 坐在教室最后面的一个学生举起了手。

sentences.english: He raised his hunting spear to kill the bear.
sentences.chinese: 他举起他的矛要射死这只熊。

sentences.english: Eventually, IBM proceeded to throw the towel in the desktop-OS wars.
sentences.chinese: 最终，IBM在桌面OS的战争中举起了白旗。

sentences.english: They all raised the standard of revolt against the tyrant.
sentences.chinese: 他们都举起义旗，反对暴君。

sentences.english: Sniffed it with pleasure then clinked his glass to hers.
sentences.chinese: 先高兴的闻了闻，再举起杯和玛丽莎碰了碰。

sentences.english: Lao Wan hoists the bottle thrusting it into his mouth as if he were blowing a bugle.
sentences.chinese: 老万举起酒瓶，对着嘴喝将起来，好像吹喇叭一样。

definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to raise one's head/to perk up
to erect (a tent etc)/to prick up (one's ears)/to raise (one's eyebrows)/to stick up (one's thumb)/to turn up (one's collar)/(of a bird) to puff up (one's feathers)
to hold/to grasp/to clench (one's fist)/to master/classifier: a handful
